text: Jordan Hendry (born February 23, 1984 in Nokomis, Saskatchewan) is an Canadian professional ice hockey defenceman that currently plays for Straubing Tigers of the DEL. He played college ice hockey with the University of Alaska Fairbanks Nanooks. Hendry has played in the National Hockey League with the Chicago Blackhawks from four seasons and the Anaheim Ducks for 2 games. He has also played for HC Lugano of the National League A. Hendry won the Stanley Cup with the Chicago Blackhawks on June 9, 2010 which he took to his hometown of Nokomis. ==References== == Other websites == * Category:1984 births Category:Living people Category:Anaheim Ducks players Category:Canadian ice hockey defencemen Category:Chicago Blackhawks players Category:Houston Aeros (1994â€“2013) players Category:Ice hockey people from Saskatchewan Category:Norfolk Admirals players Category:Rockford IceHogs (AHL) players Category:Stanley Cup champions Category:Swedish Hockey League players
title: Jordan Hendry
